greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Riordan array ((1+2x)/(1+x),(1+x)).
formula: Triangle T(n, k) = binomial(k, n-k)+binomial(k-1, n-k-1).
xref: Row sums are A098600. Diagonal sums are A098601.
Cf. A029635. Apart from signs, same as A100218. Very similar to triangle A111125.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Sep 17 2004
